patternName.description: The name of the core pattern (e.g., Action, Informational).

category.description: Pattern category (e.g., Actions, Navigation, Form Controls).

overview.description: High-level summary of the pattern and its purpose.

whyUse.description: Rationale for why this pattern exists and when to use it.

structure.description: Description of the pattern’s anatomy, states, and key variants.

variants.description: List of pattern variants (e.g. background styles, sizes).

usageGuidelines.description: Do’s and don’ts or implementation notes for consistent use.

sharedTokenUsage.description: Design tokens (typography, color, spacing) reused by this pattern.

examples.description: Example components or real-world uses of this core pattern.

description.description: Explanation of when and why to use this variant.
